string.text: Safe
I'll put some of my extra stuff in a safe at the factory. Hope no one goes in there.
Stump near the farm
Was scouting with my binoculars when I saw a guy putting stuff in a stump. I'll have to find a moment and take a look when things calm down.
Box in camp
I'll leave the bulk of my stuff in the camp. Just hope the boys keep watch of it!
Under the cistern
I'll just hide some of my stuff in a pipe under the cistern. A perfect spot; no one will notice!
Log in anomaly
I saw this stalker find an artifact and stash it in a log at light speed! Must've been pretty irradiated for him to hide it so quickly. I should check it out — it might just be worthwhile.
Backpack in bushes
I made a stash in some bushes near the old underground passage. Gotta remember to retrieve it after the raid, 'cause I don't want to lose all this stuff.
Stump in field
Tracked down the rat that was stealing stuff from the base! When I get to his lair, I'mma smash the shit out of it.
My supplies
Made a stash with supplies for when SHTF. Just hope no passerby finds it.
Gag pipe
Found an interesting construct. Crawling in is easy, but getting out? Good luck with that. It'll make a nice spot for my spare supplies.
Supplies
I must say, I've been lining my pockets pretty good as of late! I should find a place for my future stashes...
Piece of pipe
There's a nice hidden spot where this stalker was dropping off his loot. Guy's obviously well-off, so that stash deserves a checking out.
Safe among trash
There, now you have access to my safe at the gas station. Don't forget about the guys in the base, they're just waiting to get their hands on any passing stalkers.
Backpack
One of my bros has a stash nearby, he's been ill from a month from overexposure. It's gotta have valuable stuff inside.
Room with flasks
Made it into the laboratory through the vents. Hearing some strange sounds nearby. I dropped some equipment to lighten the load, and now I'm off to find a way to the surface...
